price: Therefore establish weights in justice, and do not give short measure.
arabic: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلۡوَزۡنَ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِ وَلَا تُخۡسِرُواْ ٱلۡمِيزَانَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
